languages.text: Встреча с регентом оказалась ловушкой — навигаторы совершили покушение на Кассию, которое почти увенчалось успехом. Необходимо немедленно устранить угрозы жизни Лорд-капитана и Кассии Орселлио.

traits.locale_text: Встреча с регентом оказалась ловушкой — навигаторы совершили покушение на Кассию, которое почти увенчалось успехом. Дворец утопает в вое сирен — нападающие окружили тронный зал.

languages.text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.
languages.original_text: Встреча с регентом оказалась ловушкой — навигаторы совершили покушение на Кассию, которое почти увенчалось успехом. Необходимо немедленно устранить угрозы жизни Лорд-капитана и Кассии Орселлио.

traits.locale_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

languages.text: 与摄政王的会面原来是个陷阱。那群导航者打算刺杀卡西娅，而且他们差点就得手了。必须立刻消灭那些打算谋害领主舰长与卡西娅的不法之徒。
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

traits.locale_text: 与摄政王的会面原来是个陷阱。那群导航者打算刺杀卡西娅，而且他们差点就得手了。必须立刻消灭那些打算谋害领主舰长与卡西娅的不法之徒。

languages.text: 摂政との会談は罠だったことが判明した。カシアを殺そうという航宙士の試みはあやうく成功するところだった。ロード・キャプテンとカシアに対する深刻な脅威を直ちに排除しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

traits.locale_text: 摂政との会談は罠だったことが判明した。カシアを殺そうという航宙士の試みはあやうく成功するところだった。ロード・キャプテンとカシアに対する深刻な脅威を直ちに排除しなければならない。

languages.text: La reunión con el regente ha resultado ser una trampa. Los Navegantes han intentado matar a Cassia y por poco lo consiguen. Es necesario eliminar la amenaza contra la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y Cassia inmediatamente.
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

traits.locale_text: La reunión con el regente ha resultado ser una trampa. Los Navegantes han intentado matar a Cassia y por poco lo consiguen. Es necesario eliminar la amenaza contra la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y Cassia inmediatamente.

languages.text: Das Treffen mit dem Regenten hat sich als Falle erwiesen. Die Navigatoren wollten Cassia töten und hätten es beinahe geschafft. Die tödliche Bedrohung für Cassia und den Lord Captain muss umgehend beseitigt werden.
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

traits.locale_text: Das Treffen mit dem Regenten hat sich als Falle erwiesen. Die Navigatoren wollten Cassia töten und hätten es beinahe geschafft. Die tödliche Bedrohung für Cassia und den Lord Captain muss umgehend beseitigt werden.

languages.text: La rencontre avec le régent était un piège ! Les navigateurs ont tenté d'assassiner Cassia et ont bien failli réussir. La menace mortelle qui plane sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et Cassia doit être éliminée immédiatement.
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.

traits.locale_text: La rencontre avec le régent était un piège ! Les navigateurs ont tenté d'assassiner Cassia et ont bien failli réussir. La menace mortelle qui plane sur {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et Cassia doit être éliminée immédiatement.

languages.text: Naiple gerçekleştirilen görüşmenin bir tuzak olduğu anlaşıldı. Cassia'yı öldürmeye çalışan Rotacılar, neredeyse başarılı olacaktı. Lord Kaptan ve Cassia'ya yönlendirilen ölümcül tehlike derhâl ortadan kaldırılmalı.
languages.original_text: The meeting with the regent turned out to be a trap — the Navigators attempted to kill Cassia, and they almost succeeded. The mortal threat to the Lord Captain and Cassia must be eliminated immediately.
